price: 102. Maka mereka tidak menunggu-nunggu kecuali (kejadian-kejadian) yang sama dengan kejadian-kejadian (yang menimpa) orang-orang terdahulu sebelum mereka. Katakanlah, “Maka tunggulah, aku pun termasuk orang yang menunggu bersama kamu.”
arabic: فَهَلۡ يَنتَظِرُونَ إِلَّا مِثۡلَ أَيَّامِ ٱلَّذِينَ خَلَوۡاْ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡۚ قُلۡ فَٱنتَظِرُوٓاْ إِنِّي مَعَكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡمُنتَظِرِينَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fahal yantaẓirūna illā mith'la ayyāmi alladhīna khalaw min qablihim qul fa-intaẓirū innī maʿakum mina al-muntaẓirīna
